mapper.select: SELECT project_seq AS projectSeq, project_title AS projectTitle, project_status AS projectStatus, project_img_url AS projectImgUrl FROM tbl_project

SELECT p.project_seq AS projectSeq, p.project_title AS projectTitle, p.project_status AS projectStatus, p.project_img_url AS projectImgUrl FROM tbl_project p JOIN tbl_project_member pm ON p.project_seq = pm.project_seq WHERE pm.user_seq = #{userSeq} AND pm.project_member_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT p.project_seq AS projectSeq, p.project_title AS projectTitle, p.project_content AS projectContent, p.project_status AS projectStatus, p.project_head_count AS projectHeadCount, p.project_img_url AS projectImgUrl, p.project_start_date AS projectStartDate, p.project_end_date AS projectEndDate, u.user_name AS projectAdminName FROM tbl_project p LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON p.project_admin_seq = u.user_seq WHERE p.project_seq = #{projectSeq}

SELECT p.project_seq , p.project_title , p.project_content , p.project_status , p.project_head_count , p.project_img_url , DATE_FORMAT(p.project_start_date , '%Y-%m-%d') project_start_date , DATE_FORMAT(p.project_end_date , '%Y-%m-%d') project_end_date , pm.project_mentor_yn FROM tbl_project p JOIN tbl_project_member pm ON pm.project_seq = p.project_seq JOIN tbl_user u ON u.user_seq = pm.user_seq WHERE p.project_seq = #{projectSeq} AND pm.user_seq = #{userSeq};

SELECT project_member_seq , user_name , project_member_del_yn , project_mentor_yn , u.project_member_major_yn as user_major_yn , project_member_develop_type , project_member_commit_score FROM tbl_project_member pm JOIN tbl_user u ON pm.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE project_seq = #{projectSeq}
